sense.gloss: to turn, to rotate, to spin, to twist, to gyrate
to pass around, to send around, to hand around, to circulate
to move (someone or something to where its needed), to send, to bring, to transfer, to forward, to direct, to submit
to turn (to a new use), to use (for something else)
to turn on (something that turns or has a rotating part, e.g. a washing machine), to start up (e.g. an engine), to give (something) a spin
to put (someone in a position), to make (e.g. an enemy of)
to ... around (e.g. chase, fool, play), to do all over, to do everywhere, to do completely
to surround (something) with, to enclose with
to put (an arm) around (e.g. someone's waist), to reach around

sdata.j: そのように↑刃物↑↓はもの↓を↑振↑↓ふ↓り|↑回↑↓まわ↓す|ことは↑危険↑↓きけん↓だ。
sdata.e: It is dangerous to wield an edged tool in such a way.

sdata.j: すなわち、その↑路線↑↓ろせん↓が↑通↑↓とお↓る↑土地↑↓とち↓の↑所有↑↓しょゆう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑意向↑↓いこう↓、↑他↑↓た↓の↑町↑↓まち↓や↑村↑↓むら↓の↑便宜↑↓べんぎ↓をはかるために、あるいは↑他↑↓た↓の↑路線↑↓ろせん↓との↑接続↑↓せつぞく↓をはかるために↑迂|回↑↓うかい↓す|ることのメリットなどである。
sdata.e: In other words, the merits, etc. of making detours are the consideration of the attitudes of the landowners whose property the line would cross, the convenience of other towns and villages, as well as connection with other railway lines.

sdata.j: このつまみを|↑回↑↓まわ↓す|ことでテレビの↑色↑↓いろ↓を↑調節↑↓ちょうせつ↓できます。
sdata.e: You can adjust the color on the TV by turning this knob.

sdata.j: あたりを↑見|回↑↓みまわ↓す|と、↑机↑↓つくえ↓の↑上↑↓じょう↓に↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓があるのに↑気↑↓き↓づいた。
sdata.e: When I looked about, I found a letter on the desk.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑書類↑↓しょるい↓をいじくり|↑回↑↓まわ↓す|な。
sdata.e: Don't monkey around with my papers.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑大↑↓おお↓きな↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑乗↑↓の↓り|↑回↑↓まわ↓す|のに↑反対↑↓はんたい↓だ。
sdata.e: I'm against people driving big cars.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑敵↑↓てき↓に|↑回↑↓まわ↓す|な。
sdata.e: Don't make an enemy of him.

sdata.j: ↑帽子↑↓ぼうし↓を↑弄↑↓いじく↓り|↑回↑↓まわ↓す|のはやめなさい。
sdata.e: Please stop playing with your hat.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓がネジを|↑回↑↓まわ↓す|と↑水↑↓みず↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓してきた。
sdata.e: When I turned the screw, water burst out.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓がネジを|↑回↑↓まわ↓す|と↑急↑↓きゅう↓に↑水↑↓みず↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓してきた。
sdata.e: When I turned the screw, water burst out.
